item.title: About
item.description: iztok is an architecture and design practice based in Sofia and Tokyo. We offer services in architectural, interior, structural, product, and industrial design. Our team’s expertise includes but is not limited to concept design, technical 2D, 3D, and BIM modeling, computational design as well as environmental analysis, structural optimization and customized software solutions for the building and design industry.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact us on info@iztok.co or simply fill out the form below.
